q: Why do I need to pay at the start of the campaign and not on success?
a: We manage to be 10-15 times cheaper than a traditional recruitment agency by getting a small commitment upfront.
Candidates are referred by our community of Freecruiters.

Freecruiters are professional recruiters working independently your jobs. Each of them have disciplines and industries they specialise in. We have recruiters in all the global business hubs in Asia, Europe, the Middle-East and Americas.
Our team leaders are responsible for filtering the applicants based on your requirements. They make sure you only receive suitable and interested candidates.

q: When will I receive the first candidates?
a: You will receive the first candidates within 5-7 days after the start of the campaign. Unless otherwise agreed, you will get a shortlist of ten candidates within 2 weeks.

q: How do I get in contact with candidates?
a: You can message them directly within the application.

q: What happens if I don’t find anyone to hire within your shortlist?
a: You get a refund if you don’t find anyone to hire within the shortlist. Refunds will not be applicable if the position is cancelled, on hold or is filled internally.
